name: PiX
description: PiBank Protocol is a decentralized financial protocol on Polygon, providing on-chain staking, structural incentives, and liquidity mechanisms, all executed automatically by smart contracts without centralized control. PiX (Protocol Interaction eXpression Token) is the core utility token of PiBank Protocol. It is used for staking to activate structural incentives, providing liquidity, and participating in the protocolâ€™s on-chain economic structure.
